entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023
